about.bio: I am an environmental scientist and disaster management professional with a passion for technical writing and sustainability. With over 5 years of experience in environmental impact assessments, disaster risk management, and technical communication, I strive to bridge the gap between complex scientific concepts and practical applications. My goal is to promote sustainable practices and enhance community resilience through clear and effective communication.
